name: ASOCIACION ESPAÑOLA DE FABRICANTES DE ABONOS ORGANO-MINERALES Y ORGANICOS (ORGANIC AND ORGANO-MINERAL FERTILISER MANUFACTURERS´ SPANISH ASSOCIATION)
goal: It is an Association of manufacturers which joints the more representative Spanish companies on solid and liquid organic and organo-mineral fertilisers, organic soil improvers, amino acids, humic acids, growing media, biostimulants, etc. and it has also collaboration agreements with manufacturers from Italy, France, Greece and Portugal; so the goal is to represent the interests of the sector in the National and European competent authorities, especially, European Commission and European Parliament. This Association participates as an observer in the Fertilisers Working Group of the European Commission for the development of the future regulation of fertilisers at European level, with more than twenty-five years of experience in the Spanish and European market.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety
euInitiatives: Fertilising product Regulations (organic, organo-mineral, mineral, organic soil improvers, humic acids, amino acids, growing media, biostimulants, etc.)
